description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. One of the biggest and funniest trivia games ever made.   Includes more than five thousand questions, custom penalties, cards with benefits, etc... In addition, an exclusive single player mode and ranking of top players. Up to four players with only one pad or more! Bigbutton controller compatible.
